comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Mrs S. A. Allen's World Hair Restorer (a cure-all) is regularly advertised in the SMH in the 1880s and 1890s.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
I think this is also at Circular Quay from the saw-tooth roof and windows on the wool store behind the Paragon Hotel.  In 1888 it was the Harrison, Jones & Devlin Ltd wool store.  We are looking south, roughly where the current Ship Hotel is on the corner of Pitt Street.

See this later photo of the warehouse -

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/5168027084/]
